Class SongsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • nkfust.selab.android.explorer.layout.processer.SongsManager

  • public class SongsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a song manager, it can search all mp3 files at the current path.

    Zi-Xiang Lin
